Meselech Melkamu amụrụ na 27 Eprel, na afọ 1985 na Debre Marqos) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge

O meriri Meseret Defar iji merie nrite ọla edo nke mita 5000 na 2008 African Athletics Championships, mana a maara ya nke ọma maka ọsọ ya 29:53.80 karịa mita 10,000 na afọ 2009, nke ruo n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, na afọ 2016 mere ya nke abụọ na ndepụta oge niile n'azụ onye na-edekọ ụwa Wang Junxia
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị asaa n'akụkọ ihe mere eme mebiri ihe mgbochi nkeji iri atọ na otu n'etiti ndị Etiopia anọ rụzuru ọrụ ahụ.
Kemgbe afọ 2012, ọ na-asọ mpi na asọmpi okporo ụzọ
O meriri na 2012 Frankfurt Marathon na ndekọ ọmụmụ na nke kachasị mma nke 2:21:01 awa.
O mere ọganihu ya na ndị na-eto eto na afọ 2004 site na mmeri na IAAF World Cross Country Championships ma were aha mita 5000 na World Junior Championships in Athletics.
Ọ hapụrụ ihe nrite ndị okenye na afọ 2005, na-ewere nke anọ na ọsọ dị mkpirikpi na World Cross Country Championships na nke anọ na mita 5000 na World Championships.

Ihe nrite mbụ ya dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu dị elu bịara n'afọ sochirinụ ka Melkamu meriri ọla nchara na agbụrụ dị ogologo na nke dị mkpirikpi na afọ 2006 IAAF World Cross Country Championships (na-emeri ọla edo abụọ)
Ọ gara n'ihu merie 10 kilomita Great Ireland Run n'ọnwa na-esote na ihe omume 31:41 nkeji.
Ọ kwughachiri ọla nchara ya na afo 2007, na-enyere ụmụ nwanyị Etiopia aka imeri ọla edo ọzọ
O nwetakwara ihe nrite ọlaọcha n'okporo ụzọ na All-Africa Games, na-agwụcha dị ka onye nke abụọ n'azụ Meseret Defar na mita 5000
Ọ bụ onye nke isii n'ebe ahụ na World Championships n'ikpeazụ n'afọ ahụ.
Melkamu meriri nrite mbụ ya n'ime ụlọ karịa mita 3000 na Machị, na afọ 2008, ọzọ na-ewere ọnọdụ nke abụọ n'azụ Defar na World Indoor Championships
O nwetaghị ihe nrite na World Cross Country Championships (na-agwụ na nke itoolu), mana ọ meriri Defar iji merie mita 5000 na African Championships

A họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya Etiopia na Summer Olympic Games na Beijing, na-emecha nke asaa na mita 5000 ikpeazụ n'oge 15:49.03. (Ọ gwụchara ọsọ ahụ n'ọnọdụ asatọ mana ọ rịgooro na nke asaa mgbe e wepụrụ onye nke abụọ nke Elvan Abeylegesse ọtụtụ afọ ka e mesịrị n'ihi ọgwụ ọjọọ.)
Ọ laghachiri n'ọkwa na afọ 2009 World Cross Country Championships, na-ewere ọla nchara ọzọ

N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Juun, o ji oge nke 29:53.80 merie ihe ndekọ Afrịka na 10,000 mita na asọmpi na Utrecht, Netherlands, na-emeri oge Tirunesh Dibaba nke 29:54.66. O meriri nrite mbụ ya n'ụwa n'ikpeazụ n'oge ahụ, na-agwụcha dị ka onye nke abụọ na Linet Masai na mita 10,000 na World Championships.
Ọ gara n'ihu na nrite ọla nchara ya na afo 2010 World Cross Country Championships

N'abalị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Julaị, o ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha na asọmpi African Championships na Nairobi, na-emecha nke abụọ na Dibaba na mita 10,000. Iji mechie afọ ahụ, ọ meriri Obudu Ranch International Mountain Race na Obudu ime obodo nke Naịjirịa, nke okpukpu abụọ dị ka African Mountain Running Championships.
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2011, ọ meriri n'asọmpi nke anọ ya na Jan Meda International Cross Country na Addis Ababa.
In February 2013, she ran a half marathon personal best of 1:08:05 hours while finishing in seventh place at the Ras Al Khaimah Half Marathon in the United Arab Emirates.
